category: news
title: "Rehearing Required: Changes in Fla. Rule of Civil Procedure and Fla. Family Law Rule of Procedure"
excerpt: "On its own motion, the Florida Supreme Court recently amended Florida Rule of Civil Procedure 1.530 and Florida Family Law Rule of Procedure 12.530 to include provisions requiring motions for rehearing to preserve an objection to insufficient trial court findings in a final judgment."
